title: Look to your hands
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Bacteria

description: Discusses the importance of hands to the individual and the abuses they suffer, particularly in industry. Describes the three main layers of the skin, the epidermis, dermis and subcutaneous, and their functions. Shows the process of infection through hair follicles and precautions and cures in combating bacteria.
